colleges.name: Sandeep Joshi School of Art (SJSA)
colleges.career_advancement: Strong connections with Mumbai's art industry and frequent guest lectures
colleges.culture: Diverse campus with various cultural festivals and events throughout the year
colleges.creativity: Well-equipped art studios and libraries with resources for creative growth

colleges.name: Sir J.J. School of Art
colleges.career_advance: Established reputation with opportunities for global collaborations and projects
colleges.culture: Legacy of art education with a strong sense of community and tradition
colleges.creativity: Comprehensive curriculum covering various art forms and mediums

colleges.name: Abhinav Kala Mahavidyalaya
colleges.career_advancement: Strong focus on practical skills and professional development
colleges.culture: Diverse student body and faculty with a dynamic approach to art education
colleges.creativity: State-of-the-art facilities and resources for creative growth
